complaints.summary: Stripe publishable key regression breaks homepage execution
complaints.details: Homepage still loads PaymentModal.tsx without NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY, triggering the runtime guard error and blocking navigation. This repeats even after the prior fix was marked resolved; see stripe-publishable-key-error.txt and link-check-blocked.json for the current reproduction and blocked link validation.
complaints.next_action: Restore publishable key provisioning or add resilient fallback so PaymentModal no longer blocks the homepage.

history.note: Complaint logged by Complaints pod; evidence: ops/artifacts/complaints-cycle-0002/stripe-publishable-key-error.txt, ops/artifacts/complaints-cycle-0002/home-requests-latency.txt, ops/artifacts/complaints-cycle-0002/link-check-blocked.json.
Captured Turbopack runtime stack for missing publishable key; see ops/artifacts/complaints-cycle-0002/payment-runtime-stack.txt.

complaints.summary: Marketplace revenue sharing module is syntactically invalid
complaints.details: tsc --noEmit fails with 250+ syntax errors because src/lib/marketplace/revenue-sharing-system.ts duplicates parameter blocks and leaves stray tokens (see lines 150-772). The module cannot compile, so payout processing and revenue tracking endpoints crash on import.
complaints.next_action: Repair revenue-sharing-system.ts so processRevenueShare and related helpers have valid method signatures and exports; rerun tsc to ensure payments code compiles.

history.note: Complaint logged by Complaints pod; see ops/artifacts/complaints-cycle-0003/typecheck-log.txt for the TypeScript failure.
